# The `ARMParallelDSP.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Armv6 introduced instructions to perform 32-bit SIMD operations.

The purpose of this pass is do some IR pattern matching to create ACLE DSP intrinsics, which map on these 32-bit SIMD operations. This pass runs only when unaligned accesses is supported/enabled.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Add the incoming accumulator value, returns true if a value had not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// already been added. Returning false signals to the user that this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// reduction already has a value to initialise the accumulator.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MaxBitwidth: the maximum supported bitwidth of the elements in the DSP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions, which is set to 16 So here we should collect all i8 and i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// narrow operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: we currently only collect i16, and will support i8 later, so that&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// why we check that types are equal to MaxBitWidth, and not &lt;= MaxBitWidth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxBitW</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">id</span><span class="doxyHighlight">th&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Search recursively back through the operands to find a tree of values that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form a multiply-accumulate chain. The search records the Add and Mul</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions that form the reduction and allows us to find a single value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be used as the initial input to the accumlator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMParallelDSP::Search(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopstrengthreduce-cpp/#a175f1f53cc9c3619505ffbd13aca087f">Reduction</a> &amp;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we find a non-instruction, try to use it as the initial accumulator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value. This may have already been found during the search in which case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this function will return false, signaling a search fail.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.InsertAcc(V);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pass needs to identify integer add/sub reductions of 16-bit vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiplications.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To use SMLAD:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) we first need to find integer add then look for this pattern:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// acc0 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld0 = load i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sext0 = sext i16 %ld0 to i32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld1 = load i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sext1 = sext i16 %ld1 to i32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mul0 = mul %sext0, %sext1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld2 = load i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sext2 = sext i16 %ld2 to i32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld3 = load i16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sext3 = sext i16 %ld3 to i32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mul1 = mul i32 %sext2, %sext3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add0 = add i32 %mul0, %acc0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// acc1 = add i32 %add0, %mul1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Which can be selected to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ldr r0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ldr r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// smlad r2, r0, r1, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If constants are used instead of loads, these will need to be hoisted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out and into a register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If loop invariants are used instead of loads, these need to be packed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before the loop begins.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ARMParallelDSP::MatchSMLAD(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
